argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgring.1 | |- S = ( R |`s A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_issubrg | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) /\ ( A C_ ( Base ` R ) /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. A ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprd | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> ( R |`s A ) e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> S e. Ring ) |
